name: pointing-blackjack
description: Pointing Poker with blackjack and hookers

scripts.build: cd server && npx tsc && cd ../frontend && npx ng build
scripts.build-prod: cd server && npx tsc && cd ../frontend && npx ng build --prod
scripts.test: cd frontend && ng lint && ng test --watch=false --no-progress --browsers=ChromeHeadlessNoSandbox
scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install

author: Yurius the Great
